on reading compounds: 謂【イイ】what was said, what it means, origin of a story (or tradition, etc.)
言う【イウ】to say, to utter, to declare, to name, to call, to go (e.g. "the alarm went ping"), to make a noise
kun reading compounds: 言う【いう】to say, to utter, to declare, to name, to call, to go (e.g. "the alarm went ping"), to make a noise
言うところの【いうところの】what is called, as it is called, the so-called, known as, so to speak
謂【いい】what was said, what it means, origin of a story (or tradition, etc.)
